properties.name: aws.sqs.consumer.executor.type
properties.description: Executor type to use for SQS message processing.

properties.name: aws.sqs.consumer.executor.prefer-virtual-threads
properties.description: Whether to prefer virtual threads when available (Java 21+). When true and virtual threads are available, uses virtual threads regardless of the type setting.

properties.name: aws.sqs.consumer.executor.enable-monitoring
properties.description: Whether to enable executor monitoring and metrics collection.

properties.name: aws.sqs.consumer.executor.custom-provider-bean-name
properties.description: Bean name of custom ExecutorServiceProvider when using CUSTOM executor type.
